sections.description:
Thekua – Banner for offer coupon is solution for show offer,coupon,discount on cart page,checkout page in WooCommerce in Fronten.

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handle the file transfer, and you won‚Äôt need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Thekua – Banner for offer coupon, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click ‚ÄúAdd New.‚Äù

In the search field type ‚ÄúThekua – Banner for offer coupon,‚Äù then click ‚ÄúSearch Plugins.‚Äù Once you‚Äôve found us, you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by! Click ‚ÄúInstall Now,‚Äù and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the Thekua – Banner for offer coupon plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
